metadata.title: CVE-2024-26734 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:devlink: fix possible use-after-free and memory leaks in devlink_init() Thepernet operations structure for the subsystem must be registered beforeregistering the generic netlink family. Make an unregister in case ofunsuccessful registration.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
